0.title: 1960s POLITICAL QUOTES

This British PM from a publishing family wrote, "I had ... no idea of the strange underworld" of the Profumo affair

9.title: DE METER
clues: The meter of Shakespeare's sonnets, it's 10 syllables, unstressed-stressed-unstressed-etc.
